descriptor.name: hoop Epsom Body Wash - Morning Energy, Hand & Feet Soak, Workout Recovery, Pain, Destress (200 ml)
descriptor.short_desc: hoop Epsom Body Wash - Morning Energy, Hand & Feet Soak, Workout Recovery, Pain, Destress (200 ml)
descriptor.long_desc: Epsom Energy Body Wash not only cleans but also leaves you fresh, energised, and ready to take on the day! This Epsom Salt infused Women and Mens Body Wash works fast to replenish your body's lost energy, from de-cramping tense muscles to muscle recovery. Sprinkled with ocean-breeze aromatherapy, this is the ultimate shower gel for men and women to begin and end your day on an uplifting note! Amazing for hand and feet soak as well to melt away the tiredness, its the best body wash you can come across.- Key Benefits :• Epsom Salt• Muscle Recovery• Fresh notes of lavender & epsom minerals• Replenish your body's lost energy• Natural Ingredients -Marketer Name: Hedso Health and Wellness Pvt. Ltd. -Marketeer Address: 28 Vidya Vihar, West Enclave, Pitampura, Delhi - 110034 -EAN : 8906164570089

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: 1-EPIP, SIDCO, Bari Brahmana, Jammu - 181133, J&K. Mfg. Lic. No.: JK/21-22/COS-8/334

list.value: Apply generously to wet hands or loofah, gently massage all over wet body to lather, enjoy the relaxing spa feel and rinse -Caution: For external use only. If eye contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with clean water. Discontinue use if any irritation occurs.

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_prepackaged_foo.ingredients_info: Sodium Lauryl Ether Sulfate, Purified Water, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Perfume, PEG 150 Distearate, Polysorbate-20, Magnesium Sulfate (Epsom Salt), Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Extract, Rosa Damascena (Rose) Flower Extract, Cocomonoethanolamide, Benzyl Alcohol, Salicylic Acid, Sorbic Acid, Propanediol, Sodium Gluconate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Heptyl Glucoside, Sodium Benzotriazolyl Butylphenol Sulfonate, Buteth-3, Tributyl Citrate, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Anthemis Nobilis (Chamomile) Oil
